content:
Moraaneesho saakshyaarambhe chonnabgaare
Kaanaathennil vishvaasam poondaan nee dhanyan
Jaathikallil ninnaagatharil nee munnilkkunnon
Vishvaasam kaikkondoril nee onnaaman thaan
Thadvishvaasam kanditteeshan thal saukhyaarththham
Than chithram chertthannaallil nal katthonneki.
Abgaare nee dhanyan nin vishvaasam shreshdham
Kettappozhe nee vishvaasam puthre poondu.
